about.title: About VISUALEDITS
about.content:
I built this store for freelancers who want to stop wasting hours on repetitive work.

Most video editors and designers spend too much time rebuilding the same templates, setting up projects from scratch, and repeating the same workflow every single time.

This store exists for one simple reason:
Work less — deliver faster — earn consistently.

Inside, you'll find digital products made specifically for video editors & designers:
• Ready-to-use templates
• Productivity workflows
• AI toolkits
• Bundles and assets
• Systems that help you deliver client-ready results in less time

Every product is built to be:
practical, clean, fast to use, and valuable from day one.

Whether you're a beginner trying to save time or a professional looking to scale your workflow — you're in the right place.
